summary: A man's daughter is killed by thieves during a bank robbery. Due to the incompetence of the corrupt authorities, he decides to take to law into his own hands and track down the killers.
cast: Henry Silva|Luciana Paluzzi|Silvano Tranquilli|Claudio Gora|Susanna Melandri|Alberto Tarallo|Claudio Nicastro|Luciano Catenacci|Claudio Sforzini|Corrado Solari|Rosario Borelli|Franco Balducci|Ferdinando Poggi|Gilberto Galimberti|Tony Raccosta|Bruno Di Luia|Raymond Pellegrin|Salvatore Billa|Ugo Bologna|Gianni Bortolotto|Nestore Cavaricci|Domenico Cianfriglia|Giovanni Di Benedetto|Rosemarie Lindt|Fulvio Mingozzi|Joris Muzio|Corrado Olmi|Nello Pazzafini|Anna Maria Perego|Riccardo Petrazzi|Piergiorgio Plebani|Domenico Ravenna|Dardano Sacchetti|Maurizio Streccioni
title: El hombre de la calle hace justicia
